analysis.key_quote: I oppose the proposed rule "Improving Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service" because it would represent an unprecedented increase in politicizing the federal workforce, which would predictably undermine performance and accountability in the federal government, as well as democratic values such as transparency and the rule of law.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and highlights concerns about the politicization of the federal workforce, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
